thread.title: Dialogue Between Religions Necessary to Avert Clash of Civilizations
thread.title_full: Dialogue Between Religions Necessary to Avert Clash of Civilizations - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Dialogue Between Religions Necessary to Avert Clash of Civilizations
text: European governments must promote dialogue among religions to prevent radical groups from using religious dogma to spread intolerance, Azerbaijan lawmaker Sahiba Gafarova said, at the Parliamentary Assembly of the Council of Europe (PACE) on Wednesday. ...
